text.content:
Vibration

If you're using a bludgeoning weapon, you drop that weapon and become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} until healed.

Melee

Recoil

You are pushed 5 feet backwards and fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone}.

Ranged

Punctured Foot

You take @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d4.success]. Until this effect ends, you take a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Effect: -10-foot circumstance penalty to your land Speed]{-10-foot circumstance penalty to your land Speed}.

Unarmed

Mental Backlash

Until healed, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stupefied]{Stupefied 3}.

Spell
